text: @realDonaldTrump @HARRISFAULKNER @FoxNews CNN: “tRump campaign says it can’t be held liable if rally attendees contract CORONAVIRUS.” Wow! This shows two things...1. You KNOW the virus is deadly...2. You don’t give a shit about your supporters as much as you don’t give a shit about the rest of America!
